attributes.action: Euro 2012 England Squad - Change it Roy
attributes.additional_details:
Dear Roy

Please, listen to the nation and reconsider your selection for the Euro 2012 squad.

Please leave Glen Johnson, and take Richards
Please leave Gareth Barry, and take David Beckham
Please leave Stuart Downing, and take Adam Johnson
Please leave Andy Carroll and take Peter Crouch.

The nation speaks.  Everyone can see how poor these players have been this season and everytime they have pulled on an England shirt.

Thank you
